纽约大学朗格尼分校扩大萨福克县的骨科项目，增加 23 名提供者和 4 家诊所NYU Langone Health 扩大其在长岛屡获殊荣的医疗网络，将其在萨福克县的骨科项目扩大了一倍，增加了 23 家提供者和 4 家诊所，其中包括在石溪的第一个诊所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/NYU-Langone-expands-orthopedic-program-in-Suffolk-County-adds-23-providers-and-4-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/NYU-Langone-expands-orthopedic-program-in-Suffolk-County-adds-23-providers-and-4-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfdc3d5c-cbe7-469b-bc8a-e560fd00af6a Wed, 09 Aug 2023 12:19:37 -0400 NYU Langone expands orthopedic program in Suffolk County, adds 23 providers and 4 practices
当人们了解 FDA 审批流程时，RSV 疫苗推荐率会增加一项新研究发现，如果向怀孕的家庭成员或朋友展示一张概述疫苗获得美国食品和药物管理局批准的严格流程的图表，他们更有可能建议怀孕的家庭成员或朋友接种疫苗，以保护婴儿免受 RSV 疾病的侵害。美国食品药品监督管理局）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/RSV-vaccine-recommendation-rates-increase-when-people-are-informed-about-FDA-approval-process.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230809/RSV-vaccine-recommendation-rates-increase-when-people-are-informed-about-FDA-approval-process.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6be5bfb9-7b0a-40c4-867d-a54db7b26664 Wed, 09 Aug 2023 10:37:00 -0400 RSV vaccine recommendation rates increase when people are informed about FDA approval process
